
This command helps you create just an Ellar project provided the `"pyproject.toml"` file exists in the working directory(`CWD`)

```shell
ellar create-project my_new_project
```

will create a folder as follows:
```angular2html
my_new_project/
├─ apps/
│  ├─ __init__.py
├─ core/
├─ config.py
├─ domain
├─ root_module.py
├─ server.py
├─ __init__.py
```
